// Create a Securty Hub Client
$client = new Aws\SecurityHub\SecurityHubClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'version' => '2018-10-26',
    'region' => 'us-east-2'
]);

try {
    $result = $client->getInsights([]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage() . "\n";
}
